A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
An explosive addition to the lore. 

The last Jedi dared in many ways\, go where other Star Wars didn't. And that pissed many off. 
The intelligent use of lore\, bold decisions with the characters and parallels with the current political climate make this entry to franchise one of the most relevant since its creation.

The characters are vivid and complex\, with the odd exception of phasma. The focus on the new generation is divisive but ultimately makes sense. The plot turns help break the monotony of a predictable outcome and invigorate the main characters in new directions. 

Ultimately this fresh take on a cultural colossus will always stand out\, even facing the hatred.
